mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(userId, qty, detailNum2, detailNum, productNum, reg_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{qty}, #{detailNum2}, #{detailNum}, #{productNum}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET qty = #{qty}, reg_date = SYSDATE WHERE detailNum2 = #{detailNum2} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT userId, ct.qty, ct.detailNum, op.optionValue, ct.detailNum2, op2.optionValue optionValue2, delivery, price, discountRate, ct.productNum, productName, thumbnail, ct.reg_date FROM cart ct JOIN product p ON ct.productNum = p.productNum JOIN optionDetail op ON ct.detailNum = op.detailNum JOIN optionDetail op2 ON ct.detailNum2 = op2.detailNum WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY reg_date DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE reg_date + 20 < SYSDATE
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM productOrder po JOIN orderDetail od ON po.orderNum = od.orderNum WHERE po.memberIdx = #{memberIdx} AND userDelete = 0

SELECT po.orderNum, po.memberIdx, to_char(orderDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') orderDate, totalMoney, od.savedMoney, usedSaved, deliveryCharge, payment, qty, salePrice, od.orderDetailNum, op.detailNum, op.optionValue, detailNum2, op2.optionValue optionValue2, od.productNum, productMoney, productName, thumbnail, orderState, od.detailState, orderStateDate, deliveryName, invoiceNumber, NVL(reviewWrite, 0) reviewWrite FROM productOrder po JOIN orderDetail od ON po.orderNum = od.orderNum JOIN product p ON od.productNum = p.productNum JOIN optionDetail op ON od.detailNum = op.detailNum JOIN optionDetail op2 ON od.detailNum2 = op2.detailNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, 1 reviewWrite FROM productReview WHERE memberIdx = #{memberIdx} ) r ON od.orderDetailNum = r.num WHERE po.memberIdx = #{memberIdx} AND userDelete = 0 ORDER BY orderDate DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT po.orderNum, op.detailNum, p.productName, op.optionValue, detailNum2, op2.optionValue optionValue2, od.qty, od.price, od.salePrice, od.couponPrice, od.productMoney, TO_CHAR(po.orderDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') orderDate, po.deliveryCharge, po.deliveryName, po.invoiceNumber, po.orderSort, pd.payMethod, p.thumbnail, de.recipientName, de.tel, de.zip, de.addr1, de.addr2, de.destMemo, cancelCost, com_date FROM orderDetail od, productOrder po, orderChange oc, product p, orderDelivery de, optionDetail op, optionDetail op2, payDetail pd WHERE od.orderNum = po.orderNum AND od.productNum = p.productNum AND oc.orderDetailNum(+) = od.orderDetailNum AND od.orderNum = de.orderNum AND od.detailNum = op.detailNum AND od.detailNum2 = op2.detailNum AND od.orderNum = pd.orderNum AND od.orderDetailNum = #{orderDetailNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO detailStateInfo(stateNum, orderDetailNum, memberIdx, detailState, stateMemo, detailStateDate) VALUES (detailState_seq.NEXTVAL, #{orderDetailNum}, #{memberIdx}, #{detailState}, #{stateMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE orderDetail SET detailState = #{detailState} WHERE orderDetailNum = #{orderDetailNum}
UPDATE orderDetail SET userDelete = 1 WHERE orderDetailNum = #{orderDetailNum}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(count(*),0) FROM productOrder po JOIN orderDetail od ON po.orderNum = od.orderNum JOIN orderChange oc ON oc.orderDetailNum = od.orderDetailNum WHERE po.memberIdx = #{memberIdx} AND userDelete = 0

SELECT po.orderNum, po.memberIdx, to_char(orderDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') orderDate, totalMoney, od.savedMoney, usedSaved, deliveryCharge, payment, qty, salePrice, od.orderDetailNum, op.detailNum, op.optionValue, detailNum2, op2.optionValue optionValue2, od.productNum, productMoney, productName, thumbnail, orderState, od.detailState, orderStateDate, deliveryName, invoiceNumber, to_char(oc.reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, oc.changeSort,to_char(oc.com_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') com_date , oc.changeSort, cancelCost FROM productOrder po JOIN orderDetail od ON po.orderNum = od.orderNum JOIN product p ON od.productNum = p.productNum JOIN optionDetail op ON od.detailNum = op.detailNum JOIN optionDetail op2 ON od.detailNum2 = op2.detailNum JOIN orderChange oc ON oc.orderDetailNum = od.orderDetailNum WHERE po.memberIdx = #{memberIdx} AND userDelete = 0 ORDER BY oc.reg_date , oc.com_date DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderChange (changeNum, orderDetailNum, reg_date, changeSort, changeState, cancelCost, cancelMet) VALUES (change_seq.NEXTVAL, #{orderDetailNum}, SYSDATE, #{changeSort}, #{changeState}, #{payment}, 1)
